Name: AddressType
Title: AddressType
Descriptino: The type of an address (physical / postal).

Name: AddressUse
Title: AddressUse
Descriptino: The use of an address.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Descriptino: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Descriptino: Use of contact point.

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: BackportContentCodeSystem
Title: Backported R5 Subscription Content Code System
Descriptino: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.

Name: ContactRole2
Title: contactRole2
Descriptino: Code system of concepts which specify a relationship role that the next of kin/associated parties plays with regard to the patient. Also used in referrals, for example, it may be necessary to identify the contact representative at the clinic that sent a referral. Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the NK1 and CTD segments after 2.5, when it replace 2.16.840.1.113883.18.57.

Name: IdentifierType
Title: identifierType
Descriptino: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

Name: MaritalStatus
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: \* \* \* No description supplied \* \* \*    *Open Issue:* The specific meanings of these codes can vary somewhat by jurisdiction and implementation so caution should be used when determining equivalency.    *Open Issue:* fixing and completion of the hierarchy and proper good definitions of all the concepts is badly needed.

Name: NullFlavor
Title: NullFlavor
Descriptino: A collection of codes specifying why a valid value is not present.

Name: AddressValidationCS
Title: BC Client Registry Address Validation Status Code
Descriptino: Codes used to define the address validation status.

Name: MergeStatusCS
Title: BC Client Registry merge status.
Descriptino: Codes used to describe the merge status.

Name: PatientChangeNotificationEvents
Title: BC Client Registry Patient Change Notification Events Code System
Descriptino: Codes used to indicate that type of patient changes that a subscriber is interested in receiving.

Name: UpdatePatientOperationCS
Title: BC Code System Of Allowed Update Operations
Descriptino: BC Code System of allowed update patient operations.

Name: IdentifierStatusCS

Name: Ietf3066
